item.title: ‚ÄòWholesome claw machine game‚Äô Clawsome to be published by Whitethorn Games
item.content:encoded:
Whitethorn Games will publish Cometa Games-developed ‚Äúwholesome claw machine game‚Äù Clawsome when it launches for PC via Steam in 2026, the companies announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Step into the whimsical world of Clawsome! Help Clawby find new friends in this wholesome claw machine game in which you collect unique and quirky prizes that move, disappear and even fight back! Navigate through ever changing challenges and build the most charming diorama collection with the figurines you grab!

Key Features

  • A Claw Machine Like No Other ‚Äì Clawby isn‚Äôt your typical grabber. The world is alive with moving platforms, disappearing prizes, and unexpected twists that will keep you on your toes.
  • Collect Unique Figurines ‚Äì Each prize you grab becomes part of your growing collection. View your treasures in beautifully crafted dioramas and examine them from different angles to appreciate every tiny little detail.
  • A Cozy and Wholesome Experience ‚Äì With a playful art style and relaxing atmosphere, Clawsome will bring you joy whether you succeed or hilariously fail at grabbing a prize.
  • Charming Visuals and Delightful Soundtrack ‚Äì Enjoy a colorful and vibrant world brought to life with expressive animations and a cozy soundtrack that makes every moment feel magical.

If you enjoy lighthearted challenges, charming collectibles, and a touch of mayhem, Clawsome is the perfect game for you with a mix of cozy vibes and unpredictable fun. Test your skills in the most delightful grabber game ever!

Each grab will bring you endless excitement!

Watch a new trailer below.

Publisher Announce Trailer

item.title: Showgunners coming to PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, and Xbox One on February 19, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Pre-orders include free upgrade to Platinum Edition.

Klabater will release Artificer-developed turn-based tactical game Showgunners for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One on February 19, 2026 for $34.99, the publisher announced. Pre-orders are available now via PlayStation Store, and an Xbox demo is available now via Microsoft Store.

Showgunners first launched for PC via Steam and GOG on May 2, 2023.

Console pre-orders will be upgraded to the ‚ÄúPlatinum Edition‚Äù at no additional charge. It includes the following content:

  • A copy of Showgunners
  • Downloadable content
    • Neon Justice ‚Äì A striking costume for Scarlett, exclusive to Platinum Edition.
    • Costumes and Weapons Pack‚Äì Three unique costumes and two weapon reskins for Scarlett.
    • Cyber Runner ‚Äì A futuristic costume for Scarlett, exclusive to PlayStation pre-orders.

Here is an overview of the game, via Klabater:

About

In a dystopian future where corporations rule, a brutal reality show is the hottest entertainment property in town! You play as Scarlett Martillo, a contestant out for revenge. To win, you must navigate dangerous urban arenas packed with lethal traps and face off against hordes of heavily-armed psychopaths.

Key Features

  • Pure Turn-Based Tactical Combat ‚Äì Each stage in Showgunners has been hand-crafted to create a curated, turn-based tactical gameplay experience, heightened with the inclusion of a diabolical show director that can hinder Scarlett or help her opponents depending on your performance. This dynamic level design ensures that no two levels play the same way and keep players thinking tactically. Showgunners has been built to challenge and delight players, whether they‚Äôre a turn-based tactical game initiate or a long-time fan of the genre!
  • Fight Alongside Unique Characters ‚Äì Scarlett won‚Äôt be fighting alone. As the story progresses, players will recruit new partners that can turn the tide of battle in all kinds of exciting ways. Upgrade your characters by spending talent points in their unique skill trees and outfitting them with weapons bought at a shop or earned during battle. Hidden challenges within each chapter can unlock more allies, legendary weapons, and helpful items, so be sure to keep an eye out!
  • Face the Competition ‚Äì Players will need to navigate an obstacle course of deadly traps and lethal puzzles in real-time, but be prepared for an ambush at any corner. Psychopathic enemies like the Ogre and the Ronin aren‚Äôt the only deadly elements you‚Äôll need to overcome. Combat scenarios are peppered with unique environmental hazards, from ticking time bombs to runaway trains. There is never a dull moment in Showgunners!
  • Become a Star of the Show ‚Äì Gain fame by avoiding death, surviving rounds, and eliminating your enemies with gruesome panache. The more you succeed, the more fans you earn; your growing fame will yield increasingly beneficial sponsorship deals.

Watch a new trailer below.

Consoles Announce Trailer
